document.heading: Swampoodle Terrace Designation Emergency Act of 2022
800 and 807 in Square 748, bounded by L Street, N.E., 2nd Street, N.E., M Street, N.E., and 3rd Street, N.E., as Swampoodle Terrace.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Swampoodle Terrace Designation Emergency Act of 2022".

section.text: Pursuant to sections 401 and 422 of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01 and 9-204.22), the Council designates the park comprised of Lots 800 and 807 in Square 748, bounded by L Street, N.E., 2nd Street, N.E., M Street, N.E., and 3rd Street, N.E., as depicted in the plat in the committee report for the Swampoodle Terrace Designation Act of 2022, passed on 2nd reading on October 4, 2022 (Enrolled version of B24-722), as "Swampoodle Terrace".

codify:emergency.action: designation of the park comprised of Lots 800 and 807 in Square 748, bounded by L Street, N.E., 2nd Street, N.E., M Street, N.E., and 3rd Street, N.E., as "Swampoodle Terrace"

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement in the committee report for the Swampoodle Terrace Designation Act of 2022, passed on 2nd reading on October 4, 2022 (Enrolled version of B24-722), as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code § 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), and shall remain in effect for no longer than 90 days, as provided for emergency acts of the Council of the District of Columbia in section 412(a) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 788; D.C. Official Code § 1-204.12(a)).
